name: GRAVIA (itch)
description:
this was meant to be a remix of a F2P game althought i justified turning it into a platformer which was almost the antithesis of the game i chose to study for the assignment.... cool witchy moonpunk cop with a black hole as a friend tries to exit the cosmopolice station.

first ever solo game, made with Construct 2 in early 2016 for Game Design Studio 3.

for windows 64

instructions

right click to shoot

mouse to move the black hole

A and D to walk

W to jump

W in mid-air to double jump

music is Modern Witch's Cinema. slightly edited. I dont intend to make money off of this, but can be taken off by request. i dont intend to claim ownership of the song.
